pci_notebooks_dashboard_data_sync_type_h: You can choose between a push, from the APP to your data container, or a pull, from your data container to the APP.

pci_notebooks_dashboard_data_sync_all_di: All your mount directories will be synced
pci_notebooks_dashboard_data_sync_error_: An error has occurred syncing the data
